extendedInfo.description: Poker Poker Poker !  The best Texas Hold'em Poker for Android! Play live poker for free against millions of real users worldwide. Register with your Facebook account or your email and join the Poker madness today. Played by more than 25,000,000 Android users. Get Up to $500,000 free chips when opening an account for your first time !  Game features:* Live Chat* Fast Tables* Personal Avatars * Shootout poker tournament mode * Sit-n-Go poker  tournament Mode* Poker Ring Games* Free daily Gold* Lottery Draw* 200+ Virtual goods you can send people on tables* Facebook connect for fast registration (optional)* Save to SD cardSearch Keywords: Dragonplay Poker, Card & Casino, Tournament, Texas Holdem, Texas Hold'em, games, table, chips, Live Hold, las vegas, turn-based, heads-up poker, heads up poker, turn based, Fast fold, Sit & Go, Shootout, Poker, live hold'em, live holdem, holdem ,hold'em, zynga poker,pokerist ,ãã­ãµã¹ãã¼ã«ã¼,Ø¨ÙÙØ± ØªÙØ³Ø§Ø³,Î ÏÎºÎµÏ ÏÎ¿Ï Î¤Î­Î¾Î±Ï,íì¬ì¤ í¬ì»¤,ÑÐµÑÐ°ÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ Ð¿Ð¾ÐºÐµÑ,Ø¨ÙÙØ± ØªÙØ³Ø§Ø³

reviews.comment: Dragonplay Texas Hold\'em poker is my favorite game, that I can play on my phone.\tVery real & fast. Bet your good cards or try a bluff. It\'s fun!   @ curt gaylor

reviews.author: Thomas Davis

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: The most exciting and entertaining game that i played ever with excellent graphics and features..
reviews.author: Siddhartha Yadav

reviews.title: Good all around game
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing dragonplay poker on every smartphone I\'ve gotten.  Good all around game with plenty of different players and a chat option.  Also a messsenger option and a friends list.  And did I mention it can be moved to the sd card?  Solid choice for a free app
reviews.author: Scott Fuchs-Stengel

reviews.title: Nice enough interface, but randomly folds your hands
reviews.comment: Fine when it works, but at least once in every game it randomly folds your hand. Imagine having a full house of aces over 9\'s and, having bet into the hand, the program decides you want to fold your hand on the river. This occurs continually in this app. Don\'t waste money on chips either.
reviews.author: Brad Storch

reviews.title: I love everything about this ap. ;)
reviews.comment: This is by far the best poker ap. You have so many choices on how to play. Between all the different tables and the tournaments, you will have non stop fun for hours. Also the daily draw is awesome too. LOVE IT!
reviews.author: Kathy Hammond

reviews.title: Great poker site! Very enjoyable!
